name: Caspian Radio Service LLP
about: Caspian Radio Service LLP is a certified aviation training organization based in Atyrau, Kazakhstan. We specialize in providing professional training for civil aviation personnel, focusing on radio communication and navigation skills. Our training programs are designed to meet the highest standards, ensuring students gain the necessary qualifications and expertise for successful careers in aviation. With a dedicated team and modern facilities, we offer comprehensive training that includes qualification testing and specialized courses. Our commitment to excellence and safety makes us a trusted name in aviation education. We prepare our students to excel in the global aviation industry.
services:
["Air traffic services.
Meteorological support for civil aviation flights.
Air navigation services.
Remotely piloted aircraft (UAV) services"]
